title: r/Maliciouscompliance Build a Fence? OK, I'll Build the Berlin Wall!
description: r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, OP has a couple of obnoxious neighbors who try to pressure OP into paying for a brand new fence between their two properties. They refuse to contribute any money to the fence, so OP takes some creative liberties by constructing a massive concrete wall that would put the Berlin Wall to shame. Oh, and he made sure to point the ugly side of the wall towards his neighbor's house!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
